title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 679.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 679.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

When used in the following sections relating to minimum
qualifications, local social services commissioner includes any title by which
the chief executive officer of the social services department of a social
services district is referred to, who is charged with the responsibility of
administering public assistance and care as defined in the Social Services

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
679.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
